mapper.select: select m.*,ro.role_name from sys_menu m,sys_role_menu r,sys_role ro,sys_user u where u.userId=ro.role_id and ro.role_id=r.role_id and r.menu_id=m.menu_id and u.user_account=#{account}
mapper.sql: menu_id, menu_url, menu_name, menu_code, menu_parent_id, menu_order, menu_type, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (menu_id, menu_url, menu_name, menu_code, menu_parent_id, menu_order, menu_type, create_time) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into sys_menu
menu_id,
menu_url,
menu_name,
menu_code,
menu_parent_id,
menu_order,
menu_type,
create_time,
#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_order = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_menu set menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_order = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
